summary: Accountant with more than 8 years accounting experience with profit making, non for profit and non-governmental organizations (NGOs). Possess solid knowledge of GAAP, GASB and IFRS. Proficient in automated systems: such as QuickBooks, Sun system and Peachtree Accounting.
skills: Review and monitoring of accounting events
Advanced Excel (pivot tables, Lookups, references, consolidation)

experience.title: Accountant
experience.description: Responsible for account coding accuracy; record and reconcile Accounts Payables monthly; review and reconcile online corporate credit card transactions; assist in budgeting and reporting; prepare invoices for state and federal grant funders; bank reconciliation; assist with budgets; provide status of financial condition by collecting, interpreting and reporting financial data; journal entries and General Ledger analysis; AP/AR functions; train staff.

experience.title: Delegated Finance and Admin Manager and Finance Officer
experience.description: Prepared standardized monthly, quarterly, biannual and annual finances; reviewed financial reports; oversaw Organization Finance and Administration; documented NGO grant processes; assisted grantees in developing work plans, monitoring progress, tracking expenses, preparing reports; conducted field visits to monitor grantees; led sub-grantee payments and reporting; led modification of sub-agreements; maintained grants & contract documents; ensured compliance with donor terms and organizational policies; managed fixed asset inventory; prepared for audits.

experience.title: Senior Accountant
experience.description: Produced periodic financial reports for internal and external use; interpreted and analyzed reports against budgets; managed grant projects and fund release from donors; ensured procurement policies compliance; conducted bank reconciliations; reviewed payroll and taxes; managed staff benefits; asset inventory and audits support.

experience.title: Accountant
experience.description: Ensured financial transactions were recorded per COA; followed up on annual budgets/cash flows; disbursement control; procurements per policy; payroll; bank reconciliation; fixed assets and inventory; prepared documents for internal and external audits.
